text: - Infor is a global software company.
We based our solutions

on industry-grade cloud
business applications.
Our software automates everything
from an enterprise's financials

to their manufacturing
and supply chain processes
and their ERP solutions

and their workforce management
and human capital management.
At the end of the day, there's a customer,

and we wanna be able to
create some incentive,

more stronger incentives
to move them to the cloud.
Infor is on AWS Marketplace,
and one of the huge benefits we're hearing

from our customers is now
they can purchase Infor,

and it will show up on their
consolidated AWS invoice,
and take advantage of all the benefits

that they have with
their direct commitment
they have with AWS.

Partner Network has been
really terrific for Infor

because it allows us to
be into the ecosystem
of all the AWS partners

and be able to properly
manage all the accounts
that we go after together.
We have over 70,000 customers,

and still, a lot of
them are still on-prem.
We hear it a lot that they really enjoy

that we've brought AWS
in person to the table
to address their concerns.

It makes them feel a
little better comfort level

when they see both of us in
the room at the same time.
